chapter.text: 1|1|Jihi amaneku jiai fukaki arra no o nanioite.
1|2|Ban'yu no shu, arra ni koso subete no sho san'are,
1|4|saigo no shinki no hi no shusai-sha ni.
1|5|Watashi-tachi wa anata ni nomi agame tsukae, anata ni nomi o tasuke o koi negau.
1|6|Watashi-tachi o tadashi michi ni michibiki Tamae,
1|7|anata ga onmegumi o kudasa reta hitobito no michi ni, anata no ikari o ukeshi mono, mata fumi mayoeru hitobito no michide wa naku.
